Review.Titre: Do NOT purchase anything from them
Review.Contenu: Do NOT purchase anything from them because they will send you the wrong item and then punish you for it.

Placed an order for Amazon prime and the order was delayed. Literally a simple where is my order enquiry and it was the worst customer service I've ever received. One of the advisors was actually rude and didn't help any further and has since deleted the messages on Amazon live chat. So dodgy.

Product was damaged. There was no way to send back after opening and discovering damage. Was offered $35 compensation, ended up receiving $50 refund. Still have a desk that's damaged that I do not want.

Review.Titre: I received a desk for Xmas as a…
Review.Contenu: I received a desk for Xmas as a present,put it together and found one of the screws in one handle is stripped,my daughter who bought this for me,is STILL dealing with this co,!!!And STILL NO product to fix it,pathetic customer service,I will never get anything else from here,and I'm really upset for all the crap my daughter has went through to make it right!! It's Feb 12 and NOTHING yet!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Product was damaged/had scrapes on the surface. Put together and used for a few weeks. Caused a lot of serious problems with my back. Customer service is awful. They just attempt to deny any culpability. No support whatsoever. I’m 36 this is the second negative review I recall every needing to write. I would pay the cost of this desk just to forget ever dealing with them. Very poor customer service to go with inferior product. Offered me $20 as some kind of reparation. What a terrible company.

Review.Titre: Poor Customer Service trying to cancel order.
Review.Contenu: Difficult to get a hold of customer service. Staff are rude and useless. They tell you to message them via their website but no one responds. Terrible company., terrible customer service poor knowledge.

Review.Titre: I've written a review before about this…
Review.Contenu: I've written a review before about this but I got my desk with some damages so I brought it up in my last review. But now bestier has been pestering me to pull my review from here which is kinda annoying and the best they can do is $25 for a $250 desk. Am I the person in the wrong that I haven't removed my previous review?

Review.Titre: I never recieved my desk nor did i get…
Review.Contenu: I never recieved my desk nor did i get a resolve about it yet. I just checked my emails because you asked for my opinion but I was thinking you were giving me some idea as to if my desk is found or cancel my order.

Review.Titre: Ordered a desk and it was never shipped…
Review.Contenu: Ordered a desk and it was never shipped for 2 months. After several emails through support they told me I would have to order a replacement desk and when it showed up they would refund the first desk. Really? You're gonna make me wait for a refund on an item that you didn't even ship for two months?Another issue I had was that desk was bought during the christmas sale meaning it was half off. For me to order a replacement I would have to pay double what I paid for the original desk. When I notified support they offered a measly $5 coupon. No thanks. Informed support to cancel both my orders after that slap in the face. After that they finally refunded the original desk purchase but they still haven't refunded the second even though I have an email stating they sent the request for cancelation.

"Canned" or scripted responses, no follow up. A "simple" solution was turned into a complicated one, by Bestier not responding nor listening. Still no solution, other than returning and buying a different product.

Review.Titre: The desk I ordered was not the desk I…
Review.Contenu: The desk I ordered was not the desk I got - I ordered an L-shape, but got a T-shape. The holes in the side part did not line up correctly, and the screws couldn't fit properly, so once we realized it wasnt correct, we couldn't take it apart.
Items shipped to the wrong address...impossible to get support when errors were discovered...many calls to customer service...after the 3-month package is still at the wrong location

Review.Titre: This is the biggest scam of a company
Review.Contenu: This is the biggest scam of a company.   I ordered TWO desks.  One arrived.   When I called to inquire about the second desk I was told “we have to wait on ‘specialists in China’ (who don’t work weekends) to investigate why it was not shipped.”  Keep in mind I LIVE in Georgia and the Shipping warehouse is IN Georgia. They have no one in Georgia to call even though I could drive there myself.  I foresee this as a $500 disaster.  Birthday ruined.

Review.Titre: I had to contact the company 3 times…
Review.Contenu: I had to contact the company 3 times before I was finally told that the item I purchased was no longer available and that they would be refunding my money.

Buyer beware!! THEY MAKE YOU PAY FOR YOUR OWN RETURNS.  I bought one of their desks and it didn't work out. I am a tall guy and once the desk was assembled I noticed that my knees would hit the bottom of the table.  I called customer service and they told me to I would have to pay for my own return. After going to UPS, I found out the cost to return the desk was more than the desk itself.
Had a missing part, reached out to customer service after a lot of back and forth never received the part. Will never buy anything from here again.

Review.Titre: My order has been lost for months
Review.Contenu: My order has been lost for months, and the customer service is extremely slow to respond and offered no updates as far as my claim has gone.

Review.Titre: Still haven’t received my product and…
Review.Contenu: Still haven’t received my product and it’s been over 3 weeks.  So much for being delivered by Christmas as you had promised

Review.Titre: Never got my order and had to ask more…
Review.Contenu: Never got my order and had to ask more than once for my refund. I did eventually get my money back.

Review.Titre: Never received part of my order
I bought this a few weeks ago and it…
Review.Contenu: I bought this a few weeks ago and it yet to be delivered and it was "express".  At this point I want the desks but I wouldn't come back
Customer service just stopped replying to me.
Trash ass website terrible customer service
This product didn't look like what it was advertised. The amount of steam was barely visible to create the FLAME effect as l was hoping to see like the original photo.

Box damaged , pieces had the fake covering peeling off the wood, very flimsy, hard to put together . Instructions weren’t clear and skipped steps , parts were warped and for the money was not a good quality at all. Will not be purchasing again. Measurements were also misleading

Table is complicated to assemble. I called to see if it came assembled and the representative told me it would take 5 minutes to assemble. The instructions say 2 people-1 hour and an electric screwdriver is required. Still haven’t put it together and don’t know if I will.
My purchase came severely damaged. I was unable to use it.

Review.Titre: Some of the boards were chipped and…
Review.Contenu: Some of the boards were chipped and some of the bars had nicks and dents in it.
Item received was damaged.

Review.Titre: There was a chip on the wood when…
Review.Contenu: There was a chip on the wood when delivered.

Review.Titre: Tricky assembly, mislabeled pieces, no instructions included
Review.Contenu: Received my desk, the box was all but destroyed from the delivery. There were no instructions within the box, had to call the company + have them email me the instructions. Almost all the bags within the box were mislabeled which made assembling a bug challenge. Not v easy to follow instructions + a bit of a complex assembly...if you don't normally build things from bottom up. Am happy w my desk, it's not the greatest, but enough for what I need.

Review.Titre: I have yet to receive any tracking info…
Review.Contenu: I have yet to receive any tracking info or updates regarding the replacement desk I was to be sent out. Anytime I do get any response via email, it takes multiple days until I hear back again. I’ve followed up multiple times trying to get everything situated. I have been very understanding and it’s becoming a bit stressful. I got the desk as a gift for my brother, and for it to have arrived cracked and not in “new” condition, was very disappointing.Please follow back up, it would be greatly appreciated! Thank you

The desk came in a timely manner and for the most part it looks great. It came with a small piece of the wood visibly broken. (On the top of the desk to be seen at all times) I brought it to the attention of customer service in hopes of being provided with a new top piece, but was told I couldn’t be provided with a new piece and instead would be refunded $40. So my desk has a hole that needs to be covered at all times.

Review.Titre: All good except the instructions for…
Review.Contenu: All good except the instructions for assembling needs attention. Piece 16 not defined on how to orient properly causing much work to correct. Otherwise good quality.

Review.Titre: The desk came damaged in many areas
Review.Contenu: The desk came damaged in many areas, but overall the desk is nice.

My mother purchased this wine cabinet and had it sent to me. She lives in Florida and I live in Kentucky. When the cabinet arrived the bottom of the box was torn open and a lot of tape covered the hole. I contacted your company because I was missing what I thought was the instructions and hardware. Kathya F. emailed me the instructions (parts list) and said make sure everything else was there. I was missing quite a few small pieces. I emailed her the list and my address. She emailed back and said the parts should arrive in 5-7 business days. The next day she emailed and said we are shipping a whole new cabinet and it should be here sooner. She would email me a tracking number. I didn’t get a tracking number so I called and spoke with Kathya again. She said give her 24hrs and she would have one. I confirmed my address with her to make sure it was coming to me and not my mom. She said yes. The next day I got the tracking number. After it shipped it showed the delivery to my mom in Florida. So I called back and Kathya got it all straightened out and I finally got my cabinet. But when this one arrived the box was in the same shape as the first one. But this one had all the pieces and I’m satisfied.

It arrived on time and well-packaged. The final result turned out better than expected, too. My only gripe is with the instructions; I often found they lacked clarity. (Words to go with the sometimes vague images would've helped.) Design-wise, the entertainment center is great! I only wish the holes for cable management were better positioned.

Review.Titre: It's a desk with a shelf.
Review.Contenu: I built the first one a few days ago. Construct is fairly simple, appears structurally sound as its holding 3 consoles and a 32" screen. I think it could be a bit wider along the width sides to create a bit more forward space and the wiring on the rgb strip could be better, but it works well and I'm excited to get the other built for a his and hers gamer setup!

Delivery was fast and speedy, however upon receiving the product I noticed some very minor cosmetic damage around one of the corners and the underside of one of the tables. Assembly was easy albeit the instructions were slightly unclear. Everything you will need will be provided for you so there's no need for extra tools. However in my model some of the screws didn't align right during assembly - don't know if it was just my unit but it's something to be aware of. Rather satisfied with the build quality and this purchase; would recommend if you need a desk at a budget

The table I ordered arrived quickly. The box was pretty beat up but the contents were packaged so that they weren't damaged. It goes together like Ikea furniture, the quality is very much indicating that it probably won't hold up to multiple reassembled. The instructions were easy to follow. There's some small deformities and inconsistencies like gaps and misalignments, but I wasn't expecting perfection. The price feels a bit high but I'm not that experienced. All in all I'd use the service again but I did not develop brand loyalty or anything. The over all experience was good but not revolutionary.

At first I received an incorrect desk- wrong size and color. But Bestier customer service was very nice, and I received my correct desk within 2 weeks. The computer desk with shelves is great, just what I wanted, and most importantly, affordable!

Love the entertainment center, except when putting-on the hardware for the cabinet , the doors do not close properly. But will just be ok with it because it was put together for the most part after spending hours to put together wouldn’t be worth all the hassle of returning it.

Review.Titre: Had a great experience with customer service
Review.Contenu: Had a great experience with customer service. When I called for support and didn’t leave a message, a call was returned to me and I was left a message for further contact. I appreciated them reaching out to me.

Review.Titre: I ordered the desk with the lightbar
Review.Contenu: I ordered the desk with the lightbar. Both said they were I'm stock but I had to wait twenty nine days for the light bar to show up from China. The shipping on the desk went well but I never received updates on the light bar. They both finally came, went together well and are well constructed and sturdy.
The computer desk arrived promptly and was not too difficult to put together and is quite sturdy. It works perfectly for holding my computer, printer and office supplies.
Great looking. Easy enough to put together. Only been using two months but assuming it holds up fantastic buy

Review.Titre: Had some issues with damaged desk…
Review.Contenu: Had some issues with damaged desk during shipping , they ddint want to send a new one but eventually took care of the matter
I'm happy with my purchase, except the ad said the stand had RGB lighting when in fact it does not.

Review.Titre: I like the look of the desk
Review.Contenu: I like the look of the desk - it was a bit difficult to put some of the pieces together.

Review.Titre: ok product but nothing i mean nothing…
Review.Contenu: ok product but nothing i mean nothing was pre Assembled

Review.Titre: Shipping box could have been better

Review.Contenu: Meet expectation

I had an issue with a fireplace.  Contacted Bestier and they responded right away.  After trouble shooting it was determined the fireplace needed to be replaced.  The staff were friendly, easy to work with and very responsive.   Best company I've dealt with in a long time.

Review.Titre: The customer service I received from…
Review.Contenu: The customer service I received from this company was outstanding.

Needed a placement part. Emailed Customer Service and the response was very quick and a replacement was ordered. I was able to track the item which arrived from overseas within 12 working days. Excellent Customer Service. Thanks Kathya

Review.Titre: Well designed furniture and awesome support.
Review.Contenu: I got an entertainment center and coffee table with LED lighting.  The furniture is very well made and solid.  It used 'cam lock' joints but also has dowel pins for added stability.The support is awesome.  I wanted an extra light strip to finish off the wall with  the entertainment center and they were more than helpful.

Review.Titre: Great and quick service got my…
Review.Contenu: Great and quick service got my replacement part quick and works perfect

Review.Titre: Although one bag of connectors was…
Review.Contenu: Although one bag of connectors was missing, Bestier worked with me to get the replacements. When it was determined that I could purchase them locally, they issued a partially refund to cover the cost. The payment showed up in my account within a couple of hours of my emailing them a copy of the receipt. I've never seen such a fast response. The is unbelievable. On another note, the desk is very nice and very well constructed.I highly recommend this company.Dave

Review.Titre: Very pleased with their custome service!  They answered my need for product…
Review.Contenu: They answered my need for product instructions immediately to which I am so grateful! I will certainly consider them again in the future.

Review.Titre: A great gift and great support!
Review.Contenu: I got one of Bestier's desks as a gift. The build quality is superb and I'm a huge fan of the black carbon fiber design. One of the pieces, unfortunately, had a decent dent in it, but customer support was quick and happy to send me a replacement part. I'm very happy to have been introduced to this brand, and will surely be recommending it to others.

Review.Titre: Great customer service they were able…
Review.Contenu: Great customer service they were able to remediate my issue in a timely manner. Enjoying my purchase.

Review.Titre: They replaced my new one that was…
Review.Contenu: They replaced my new one that was missing parts no problems very friendly fast delivery

Review.Titre: Fedex completely destroyed the box that…
Review.Contenu: Fedex completely destroyed the box that the furniture came in, however since bestier packaged it well, nothing was broken. Assembling it was very easy. Please ditch fedex as the box was almost the the point of falling apart.

Review.Titre: I had a specific desk in mind
Review.Contenu: I had a specific desk in mind.  I tried to get it from Amazon TWICE and they failed both times getting it shipped.  I went Bestier direct and it shipped almost immediately, arrived a couple days later in excellent condition and assembled without issue.  Very happy customer.

It arrived earlier than expected, it’s nice and sturdy. Versus other brands where you pay for plywood or some other panted “wood”. Easy to assemble with directions and even had extra pieces just in case. Great piece for the price and perfect for small area/desk solutions.
The shipping was fast, the product was exactly as described. We were able to put the desk together easily with no issues.  Will definitely be buying more items in the future.

Review.Titre: Great quality desk for the money spent
Review.Contenu: Great quality desk for the money spent. Just keep in mind this desk is very time consuming to assemble. 2 assembly pieces had minor paint damage and Bestier responded and took care of the issue in a very professional and timely manner. Highly recommend.

Bestier? More like bestever! The massive piece of office furniture was easy to assemble and I look forward to using the long/straight version of the desk someday when we move into a larger apartment. Exactly what I needed at an affordable price

Review.Titre: First time using this company which I…
Review.Contenu: First time using this company which I was a bit hesitant about but I’m so glad I did. My package got damaged on the way to me and they were so quick about retrieving it before being delivered and shipping me a new one. They always replied to my emails when I contacted them with questions regarding my order and shipping status. I honestly could not be any happier with the TV console I purchased from them. Good quality too. Would recommend for sure.

Review.Titre: The desk arrived quickly and in…
Review.Contenu: The desk arrived quickly and in excellent condition. Not being a “handy person,” I saw hired someone to put it together for me. The assembly took a little under two hours and I am very pleased with the desk. It looks just as nice as the online pictures and is serving my desk needs beautifully.

Great experience through and through. Ordering was a breeze, and when I realized I made a mistake in my shipping address they were quick to respond to my request to update the address.The desk was delivered on time, wasn't missing any parts, and was simple enough to assemble with the tools provided (though pay close attention to where the holes on the individual parts are, given the multiple configuration options it can be easy to have one of the legs the wrong way). The desk looks great and is super sturdy so I'm very pleased with everything.

My son and I started to put the desk together and once we got to the side notice that the side would not screw into the other side no matter how we tried.  We even flipped it and try to put the part into the other side but it would not work, also we were screwing in one of the bottom shelves as we did the other shelf in the middle chipped off and it was broken. We told the customer service person this info and he was very polite and very helpful and automatically said that he would send us another desk.  I said "that was wonderful and very helpful".  Thank you for the great customers service.

Review.Titre: The item arrived earlier than expected
Review.Contenu: The item arrived earlier than expected. It was very heavy!!  ****The top draw does not close or open easily***Well made. Not so easy for my husband to put together but we will be buying the tv console soon.  Some screws got stripped. Overall a good experience
The product initially had a faulty part, but their customer support was amazing and they replaced the part with no issues.

Review.Titre: I recently got a desk from Bestier
Review.Contenu: I recently got a desk from Bestier, and it’s the best piece of furniture I’ve ever had! Putting it together was incredibly easy, the instructions were clear and they even included a screwdriver for me to use! The desk is HUGE, especially for the price, and is very, very sturdy. It has shelves that could go on either side which is nice too! I’m very, very happy with my purchase, and I’m definitely gonna use the company again.

Review.Titre: They sent the wrong screws BUT
Review.Contenu: They sent the wrong screws, but the speed and professionalism of customer support absolutely deserves five stars!  I also got my refund within minutes of letting them know my product was incorrect.

Very solid desk. Pleasantly surprised by how well put together and sturdy it actually is. Really beautiful once you actually put it together, the wood is finished and a bit of a polish to it that makes it look really sleek.

Against some negative reviews on different sites about this particular website, I purchased a computer desk and it all arrived shipped and ready to put together. Have had the desk for several months and well, it's a desk as advertised. I saved almost $100 had I purchased the desk at office depot.

I bought 2 products from Bestier, a TV stand and an office desk. Both are great, sturdy, and very good looking. Delivery was fast and the products arrived with no damage. Instructions for assembly were good and easy to follow. Will definitely buy other things from Bestier again!

Review.Titre: I was skeptical at first but far order exceeded my expectations
Review.Contenu: I was skeptical at first when ordering from bestier but i took a chance and order a new desk from them. The desk was better quality then I expected and I even ordered another one after receiving the first. Definitely recommend buying from them.

I bought a desk that arrived with cosmetic damage from shipping. When I called Bestier, they were closed. I did not leave a message.  Less than an hour later, I received a call from a nice lady in Bestier customer service who said they had a missed call from my cell number. Wow! I was impressed and I’ve never had a large company return a missed call. The issue of the damaged desk was promptly resolved. The quality of the desk is excellent. It’s very sturdy and well designed.
Quick shipping, and the desk came exactly as it was pictured and described! Nice quality and was very easy to setup by myself.  I would definitely purchase from Bestier again.

Great product and customer service I love my desk. It was easy to assemble and is good quality. I did have damage to one piece but customer service was quick to resolve the issue and replace it. 5 stars! I would definitely order from Bestier again.

The L shaped desk I ordered online was shipped quickly to my home. It was packaged very well, no damage or missing parts. It was fairly easy to assemble following the directions & only took about 30 min. It’s a very nice looking sturdy desk that’s a great value for the price.
Great table, looks amazing. I love the quality. Best customer service.

I recently received a Bestier desk as a birthday gift. I have been on crutches for 15 months and I couldn't look at the box anymore. I built this desk. The instructions make sense. The design is simple and logical. There were no missing parts. Everything fit together perfectly. This is a great desk and I love it. I have room and convenience I've never had. Only one surface had a slight scrape on it. To show how easy it is to build, I've included me on crutches and the finished product. Thank you Bestier and thank you Best girlfriend ever!
super fast shipping, desk was super easy to put together with good instructions and all the parts were there. solid desk, happy with purchase. Would certainly buy from you folks again. thank you
Has a desk with some issues,  I reached out via email and the customer service was super friendly and helpful.  10/10 would buy from again
This is awesome place to buy furniture i bought’my Son Desk in here and plant holder they very affordable also high quality - will be back buying more.’

Review.Titre: The products are of high quality and…
Review.Contenu: The products are of high quality and are exactly as described. The delivery was timely and when I contacted customer service with a question, they were super helpful!
The final product looks <3 perfect. The packaging was great and a breeze to put together. Shipping was quick and I had no issues with missing parts or anything. It feels really solid!
My daughter loved the desk we purchased as a Christmas gift for her.  Shipping was great, especially around the holidays!!
Extremely friendly, very responsive and helpful. Went above and BEYOND what I needed and made the issue a very small thing. (Unsure who I talked too but both phone and email were perfect!)

Review.Titre: Product arrived quickly and no damage…
Review.Contenu: Product arrived quickly and no damage at all ... as one person it took me a few hours to put together but it was easy with the instructions.  I would recommend the TV stand to anyone!! Fits great and looks great!!!
What an amazing desk for such a reasonable price! Not hard to put together and you get everything you need sent with it. Will definitely purchase from again!

Review.Titre: The shelf I saw on Bestier website had…
Review.Contenu: The shelf I saw on Bestier website had all the measurements I needed to make the right choice.  I ordered, they shipped and I received my shelf in a matter of days.  And I was notified every step of the way.  Very professional in every sense.
I got a great Table from Bestier, the product is excellent, and my wife loves it, thank you!
Great desk!  We have been enjoying this L-shape desk.  Good quality, went together easily, great price, shipped on time.  Thanks for a well-made product.

Review.Titre: What I like specifically about the TV…
Review.Contenu: What I like specifically about the TV stand is the look, color, width and led lights. Assembly requires time and patience.

Review.Titre: Fast shipping and honest pricing with…
Review.Contenu: Fast shipping and honest pricing with great communication sealed the deal.  Desk is great quality and very easy assembly.
Beautiful desk with simple building instructions. And for the promotion they had for this desk, I got it at a really great price! Very satisfied.

Review.Titre: I absolutely love my tv stand!
Review.Contenu: I absolutely love my tv stand! It’s exactly what I was looking for, price was great, quality is beautiful and the shipping was so fast!

Review.Titre: Best blind purchase I've ever made
Review.Contenu: I was nervous after reading some rather untasteful things on reddit but I stuck with my gut. I'm glad I did. I found the perfect desk for me after many hours of searching.

Review.Titre: I received the table and everything…
Review.Contenu: I received the table and everything came out to be expected but the length was a little small for me but nothing to fret about. Overall one of the best tables I’ve bought and used

We love the desk.  It is just a pictured! There was only 1 day delay in shipping. It is very sturdy. It holds our two 34 in monitors, keyboard, 24 in monitor, and 2 laptops. Plenty of room on tge bookshelves. If you are looking at this desk go ahead and get it. Well worth the money.
Absolutely love my stuff! The instructions were easy to follow and we had everything put together in no time.

Review.Titre: The desk I ordered was delivered…
Review.Contenu: The desk I ordered was delivered quickly. After assembling it, I have to say it is gorgeous and sturdy. I definitely recommend their products!
I didn't have an issue. The product we purchased is a out what I'd expect considering the price range.

Review.Titre: The desk and cabinet are lovely
Review.Contenu: The desk and cabinet are lovely. They were a great price, shipped quickly and the instructions to put them together were perfect. Thank you!
They made getting a replacement for a defective  very easy. Thanks so much!
They were quick to respond and ready to take care of matters.

Exactly like the picture. Sturdy and it only took me 1hr to mount... easy breezy! Lovely for small spaces but yet, has enough counter space and shelves to use :) Love, love my new dedicated "office" space!

I ordered an L-shaped desk for my home office and have been very happy with it! Delivery was fast and easy, it was easy to put together, it is sturdy and looks great! I love the simple, clean style. The shelves are very practical.
Amazing product & great customer service. Annie went above and beyond.
Desk is just as pictured; directions were clear and easy to follow. Nice product, very happy with purchase.
Prompt delivery, Quality was even better than expected Easy to assemble and attractive. Very reasonably priced! Desk and cooridnating accessories created lots of storage and desk space.

Review.Titre: Very happy with products and service
Review.Contenu: Very happy with products and service.  Delivery was also great!  Will definitely purchase from them again.  Very happy ;)
Great desk, easy assembly, and fast shipping. Will definitely order from here again!
Product is great, came quickly no issues putting together. Glad this is the one I picked, looks great!
My desk was very nice and service was efficient. I would absolutely purchase from there again.
We ordered three of these. Easy to put together (I did it with my kids), look good and are sturdy. We also ordered the "night stands" with the same look to complete our home office.
Excellent desk as described. Speedy delivery and great customer service!  Would definitely buy from Bestier again
Loved everything about this order. Great price, great quality, fast shipping, and easy assembly.

Review.Titre: The item was even better than expected.…
Review.Contenu: The item was even better than expected and the wood look matched my office.
Great price and fast shipping. I love me new desk. Quality is good and just right for me new office. I will definitely shop again!
Quick delivery. Sturdy shelves, on the darker side. Great quality.

Review.Titre: One of the best desks I have ever…
Review.Contenu: One of the best desks I have ever purchased! Can't wait to see more and more amazing produdcts from Bestier. Best wishes to Bestier.

Review.Titre: Really grateful for the attention and…
Review.Contenu: Really grateful for the attention and information provided to me, they do great teamwork and their manufacture is of good quality, I am comfortable with the acquisition
Great quality, craftsmanship, service, delivery and product. Definite 5 star on the company and my desk!
High quality, good looking desk. I would have been satisfied at twice the price.

Review.Titre: This is one of the best things I could…what a great deal
Review.Contenu: This is one of the best things I could of brought for my son.. it’s very Sturdy . I just love it… my sister came over & saw it now she’s getting her son one.. u can’t go wrong with this👌

Review.Titre: The desk I purchased was simple and…
Review.Contenu: The desk I purchased was simple and sturdy. I was scared that it may not be worth the money. But even though I had to put it together with my daughter and it was so worth it.
Desk good. Easy make. Not doo doo. Good good. Ginger is a soulless spice. Buy if you like desks. Never trust flatulence.
I bought this desk for my son. Very good quality and sturdy desk. It is a beautiful color and he loves it so far.

Review.Titre: Great Quality, RGB Strip slight letdown
Review.Contenu: Shipped very quickly and was really simple to set up. Though I do wish the RGB strip had a better controller
It's very nice. Better than I was expecting.

Review.Titre: Love the tv stand. Just the right size. Very good quality
Review.Contenu: Love the tv stand. Color is great, but would have liked it a little more grey. Assembled very easy.

Review.Titre: The experience was great to ease of…Timely
Review.Contenu: The experience was great to ease of purchase and delivery as outlined with tracking information provided.
The desk I bought was of good quality and suitable to fit my needs

Review.Titre: My order came on time and the item…
Review.Contenu: My order came on time and the item looks fabulous.

Review.Titre: Fast shipping and easy assembly of my…
Review.Contenu: Fast shipping and easy assembly of my desk

Review.Titre: Wonderful table for a craft room
Happy with both service and pricing

Review.Contenu: Simple and quick.Delivered on time. Easy to assemble. Product was worth what I paid.
